DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 1 Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes in Entire Life Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they have smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their entire life, where 5 packs is equal to 100 cigarettes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes in Entire Life
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about whether an individual has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their entire lifetime.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable; I have not smoked cigarettes since my diagnosis.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.: A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you smoked at least 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes (5 packs=100 cigarettes) in your entire life?
